author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Walmart Says James Cash Retiring From Board, Kevin Systrom To Not Stand For Re-Election
text:
April 20 (Reuters) - Walmart Inc:
* WALMART - JAMES CASH IS RETIRING FROM BOARD
* WALMART - THIS YEAR’S PROXY MATERIALS SEEK SHAREHOLDERS’ VOTES ON 11 DIRECTOR NOMINEES, 2 COMPANY PROPOSALS AND 2 SHAREHOLDER PROPOSALS
* WALMART - KEVIN SYSTROM WILL NOT STAND FOR RE-ELECTION TO BOARD
* WALMART - STEVE EASTERBROOK, CEO OF MCDONALD’S, AS A NEW INDEPENDENT NOMINEE TO BOARD Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
